widgetitem.name: TotalsalesRevenue
widgetitem.caption: TotalsalesRevenue
widgetitem.query: select * from ViStockPerDate where coDate='2024-09-04' order by coshopno ASC
widgetitem.queryTarget: select targetAmount from TaTargetMaster WITH (NOLOCK) where status=1
